Tuck box lid - "force the tuck lid open" - card force trick
Corner top left - "aces start at one" - aces find the aces trick
Corner bottom left - "two keys at the bottom" - believe in magic trick
Corner bottom right - the other key card trick - key card trick (Jeremy Tan)
Corner top right - "clocks start at 1 o'clock (1300 hrs to deal 13 cards)" - clock work trick
Corner top left - "the back of the packet goes 5-4-3" - trick of fives
Corner bottom left - "fours on the bottom" - the four jacks trick
Corner bottom right - "fours goes on the bottom" - four cards face up (Jeremy Tan)
Corner top right - "three on the top" - kings and queens
